name: The stories only SHE can tell
name_original: The stories only SHE can tell
description:
Follow three short scenes with Grandma and Nieta as they converse over time around the house. What are the stories that live in the pauses of our conversations?

"The stories only SHE can tell" is a short vignette game by Emperatriz Ung made in Bitsy for Latinx in Gaming: Unidos Online Jam 2021 in response to the theme "A Story Only YOU Can Tell." The music by Corey Bertelsen is a variation of the song Chíu Chíu. 

Quick note 

I had difficultly with Bitsy x Unicode for certain letters (for example, corazón right now is written as corazon). Hope to fix this in the future!
